item.title: Variable Fonts
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What’s variable font? Variable fonts - officially known as OpenType Font Variations - are a font format that allows for a single font file to contain multiple variations of a typeface, such as different weights, widths, and styles, that can be dynamically adjusted in real-time using font variations.
